page.title: 19NORTH AXHOLME COMPREHENSIVE
page.content: NORTH AXHOLME COMPREHENSIVE IS A CO-EDUCATIONAL SCHOOL OF APPROXIMATELY 470 PUPILS WHO COME FROM THE VILLAGES OF EALAND, EASTOFT, LUDDINGTON, GARTHORPE, KEADBY AND ALTHORPE. A LARGE PROPORTOIN OF THE PUPILS THEREFORE TRAVEL TO SCHOOL BY BUS. A WIDE RANGE OF{EXTRA CURRICULAR {ACTIVITIES}EXIST AND ARE OPEN TO ALL WHO WISH TO TAKE PART. FOOTBALL, ROUNDERS,NETBALL, HOCKEY, ATHLETICS, TRAMPOLINE, GYMNASTICS, SWIMMING, CRICKET, BADMINTON, BASKETBALL, TABLE-TENNIS, COMPUTER, CHOIR, GUITAR, BAND, CHESS AND DRAMA ARE ALL AVAILABLE. THIS YEAR "DAZZLE" WAS THE MAJOR MUSICAL PRODUCTION. CHILDREN ARE NOT STREAMED IN THE FIRST YEAR. NEW PUPILS ARE GIVEN THE OPPORTUNITY TO SPEND A DAY AT THE SCHOOL IN THE SUMMER TERM PRIOR TO STARTING.
